
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_library(providers-pg-provider)
target_compile_options(providers-pg-provider PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_link_libraries(providers-pg-provider PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-yql-core
  yql-core-type_ann
  yql-dq-integration
  providers-common-dq
  providers-common-provider
  providers-common-transform
  providers-pg-expr_nodes
  yql-parser-pg_catalog
  yql-utils-log
)
target_sources(providers-pg-provider PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_datasink.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_datasink_execution.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_datasink_type_ann.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_datasource.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_dq_integration.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_datasource_type_ann.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/providers/pg/provider/yql_pg_provider.cpp
)
